00019 Part::Part(Score* s)
00020       {
00021       cs = s;
00022       _staves = new StaffList;
00023       }

00034 //---------------------------------------------------------
00035 //   staff
00036 //---------------------------------------------------------

00038 Staff* Part::staff(int idx) const
00039       {
00040       return (*_staves)[idx];
00041       }

00043 //---------------------------------------------------------
00044 //   read
00045 //---------------------------------------------------------
00046 
00047 void Part::read(Score* score, QDomNode node)
00048       {
00049       int rstaff = 0;
00050       for (node = node.firstChild(); !node.isNull(); node = node.nextSibling()) {
00051             QDomElement e = node.toElement();
00052             QString tag(e.tagName());
00053             QString val(e.text());
00054             if (tag == "Staff") {
00055                   Staff* staff = new Staff(score, this, rstaff);
00056                   staff->read(node);
00057                   score->staves()->push_back(staff);
00058                   _staves->push_back(staff);
00059                   ++rstaff;
00060                   }
00061             else if (tag == "Instrument")
00062                   _instrument.read(node);
00063             else if (tag == "name")
00064                   _longName = val;
00065             else if (tag == "shortName")
00066                   _shortName = val;
00067             else if (tag == "trackName")
00068                   _trackName = val;
00069             else
00070                   printf("Mscore:Part: unknown tag %s\n", tag.latin1());
00071             }
00072       }
00073 
00074 //---------------------------------------------------------
00075 //   write
00076 //---------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 void Part::write(Xml& xml) const
00079       {
00080       xml.tag("Part");
00081       for (iStaff i = _staves->begin(); i != _staves->end(); ++i)
00082             (*i)->write(xml);
00083       if (!_trackName.isEmpty())
00084             xml.strTag("trackName", _trackName);
00085       if (!_longName.isEmpty())
00086             xml.strTag("name", _longName);
00087       if (!_shortName.isEmpty())
00088             xml.strTag("shortName", _shortName);
00089       _instrument.write(xml);
00090       xml.etag("Part");
00091       }
00092 
00093 //---------------------------------------------------------
00094 //   nstaves
00095 //---------------------------------------------------------
00096 
00097 int Part::nstaves() const
00098       {
00099       return _staves->size();
00100       }
00101 
00102 //---------------------------------------------------------
00103 //   setStaves
00104 //---------------------------------------------------------
00105 
00106 void Part::setStaves(int n)
00107       {
00108       int ns = _staves->size();
00109       if (n < ns) {
00110             printf("Part::setStaves(): remove staves not implemented!\n");
00111             return;
00112             }
00113       int staffIdx = cs->staff(this) + ns;
00114       for (int i = ns; i < n; ++i) {
00115             Staff* staff = new Staff(cs, this, i);
00116             _staves->push_back(staff);
00117             cs->staves()->insert(cs->staves()->begin() + staffIdx, staff);
00118             for (Measure* im = cs->first(); im; im = im->next()) {
00119                   im->insertStaff1(staff, staffIdx);
00120                   }
00121             ++staffIdx;
00122             }
00123       }
00124 
00125 //---------------------------------------------------------
00126 //   Instrument
00127 //---------------------------------------------------------
00128 
00129 Instrument::Instrument()
00130       {
00131       midiChannel = 0;
00132       midiProgram = 0;
00133       volume  = 100;
00134       pan     = 64;
00135       chorus  = 30;
00136       reverb  = 30;
00137       mute    = false;
00138       solo    = false;
00139       show    = true;
00140       minPitch = 0;
00141       maxPitch = 127;
00142       }
00143 
00144 //---------------------------------------------------------
00145 //   write
00146 //---------------------------------------------------------
00147 
00148 void Instrument::write(Xml& xml) const
00149       {
00150       xml.tag("Instrument");
00151       xml.intTag("midiChannel", midiChannel);
00152       xml.intTag("midiProgram", midiProgram);
00153       xml.intTag("volume", volume);
00154       if (pan != 64)
00155             xml.intTag("pan", pan);
00156       if (chorus)
00157             xml.intTag("chorus", chorus);
00158       if (reverb)
00159             xml.intTag("reverb", reverb);
00160       if (mute)
00161             xml.intTag("mute", mute);
00162       if (solo)
00163             xml.intTag("solo", solo);
00164       if (!show)
00165             xml.intTag("show", show);
00166       if (minPitch > 0)
00167             xml.intTag("minPitch", minPitch);
00168       if (maxPitch < 127)
00169             xml.intTag("maxPitch", maxPitch);
00170       xml.etag("Instrument");
00171       }
00172 
00173 //---------------------------------------------------------
00174 //   Instrument::read
00175 //---------------------------------------------------------
00176 
00177 void Instrument::read(QDomNode node)
00178       {
00179       for (node = node.firstChild(); !node.isNull(); node = node.nextSibling()) {
00180             QDomElement e = node.toElement();
00181             QString tag(e.tagName());
00182             QString val(e.text());
00183             int i = val.toInt();
00184             if (tag == "midiChannel")
00185                   midiChannel = i;
00186             else if (tag == "midiProgram")
00187                   midiProgram = i;
00188             else if (tag == "volume")
00189                   volume = i;
00190             else if (tag == "pan")
00191                   pan = i;
00192             else if (tag == "chorus")
00193                   chorus = i;
00194             else if (tag == "reverb")
00195                   reverb = i;
00196             else if (tag == "mute")
00197                   mute = i;
00198             else if (tag == "solo")
00199                   solo = i;
00200             else if (tag == "show")
00201                   show = i;
00202             else if (tag == "minPitch")
00203                   minPitch = i;
00204             else if (tag == "maxPitch")
00205                   maxPitch = i;
00206             else
00207                   printf("Mscore:Instrument: unknown tag %s\n",
00208                      tag.latin1());
00209             }
00210       }

00212 //---------------------------------------------------------
00213 //   insertStaff
00214 //---------------------------------------------------------
00215 
00216 void Part::insertStaff(Staff* staff)
00217       {
00218       _staves->insert(_staves->begin() + staff->rstaff(), staff);
00219       int idx = 0;
00220       for (iStaff i = _staves->begin(); i != _staves->end(); ++i, ++idx)
00221             (*i)->setRstaff(idx);
00222       }
00223 
00224 //---------------------------------------------------------
00225 //   removeStaff
00226 //---------------------------------------------------------
00227 
00228 void Part::removeStaff(Staff* staff)
00229       {
00230       _staves->remove(staff);
00231       int idx = 0;
00232       for (iStaff i = _staves->begin(); i != _staves->end(); ++i, ++idx)
00233             (*i)->setRstaff(idx);
00234       }
